Message.Title: I see Charlene melted after being totally JUDGED!!!
Message.Msg: BOINK BOINK BOINK Faqqing hilarious, bra'!!!!!! You ebay soiled yourself. Again. cLEAN up in aisle 11. Too EASY. And Sully dangling the cARROT all the while! John's good nature eternally damns you. Just read the archives. Ya know, "undisputed tooth" really had your number. I think we need put that post up again, eh?! LOL Lookup you archived hell. Fenced in. Trapped in the searing "below"! Too good, too good! Did I mention ebay?!!!! Yee ha........ btw- CHEck the melt messages you authored last night! Stay away from the liquor when attempting to make some sort of sense in public!!!!! -Sully Rules TEAM will take over from here.......

"Other ID peddle may hard John" DRIBBLES, You might want to take another crack at that statement. It makes absolutely no sense whatsoever. Another suggestion would be for you to be sober when posting. ROTFLMAO!!! Sully
DRIBBLES, I see that you continue to post with your fake Sully id. Why do you want to be me? ROTFLMAO!!! Sully

"Other ID peddle may hard John" OMG OMG LOL LOL Pathetic!!! And she obsesses over others' typos! I left a few in my last message, just for her. She's oblivious to IT, though. Weeeeeeeeee........ -Sully Rules

Poor dumb 54yo wanna be teenager John, while marijuana might be legal in California for medicinal use, last time I checked, MDMA / Ecstasy was a Schedule I drug in all 50 states. Talk about painting a bullseye on your back.
You are bizarre, in a very scary way. Your posts reek of severe paranoid dementia found in the sickest of minds when they have been polluted by insanity.
btw, I've actually now put you on ignore because you are a real sicko. John Osborne may be a childish troll but your twisting of scenarios and paranoid delusions make you dangerous..
"MDMA / Ecstasy" Wouldn't know anything about that stuff Never tried it and probably never will "beans" are weed seed I guess you learned something new today ~ LOL
Be AFRAID very AFRAID because he might audit YOUR taxes ~ LOL
